attributes.action: house prices are killimg this country and the people in charge have three or four of them and that is why the intrerast rates are so low
attributes.additional_details: every one in the media and goverment have more than one home and will never tell the public that the reason this counrty is in so much trouble is price of housing. if housing was cheaper then people could send more on goods that can be made in this counrty and make job for british people with out having to import goods from other countrys.ARE YOU INSEAN OR JUST GREEDY>
